title: Stage S26
description: Level 1 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: It is my sister who cooks the best pasta.
What I want is just some rest.
learning_points: Level 1 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.kr: 가장 파스타를 잘 만드는 건 다름 아닌 내 여동생이에요.
sentences.en: It is my sister who cooks the best pasta.

sentences.kr: 내가 원하는 건 그저 휴식이에요.
sentences.en: What I want is just some rest.

sentences.kr: 그를 만난 건 바로 어제였어요.
sentences.en: It was yesterday that I met him.

sentences.kr: 나를 도와준 사람은 낯선 사람이었어요.
sentences.en: The one who helped me was a stranger.

sentences.kr: 내게 필요한 건 당신의 지지뿐이에요.
sentences.en: All I need is your support.

sentences.kr: 회의가 열릴 곳은 바로 이 방이에요.
sentences.en: It is in this room that the meeting will be held.

sentences.kr: 나를 놀라게 한 건 그의 정직함이었어요.
sentences.en: What surprised me was his honesty.

sentences.kr: 무언가를 잃어야만 그 가치를 깨닫게 되는 법이에요.
sentences.en: It's only when you lose something that you realize its value.

sentences.kr: 제가 여기 있는 이유는 당신을 돕기 위해서예요.
sentences.en: The reason why I'm here is to help you.

sentences.kr: 가장 중요한 건 당신의 행복이에요.
sentences.en: What matters most is your happiness.
